availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Walter (Greenup County, KY, laborer)

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, laborer. Logan County, Virginia, native. Son of George Walter. Married to Angelina Adkins Walter in Boyd County, Kentucky, on July 19, 1860. Laborer in Greenup County, Kentucky, in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, District 2, p. 197A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Boyd County Marriages, Film 000344011, p. 18.
